metadata.title: CVE-2017-12165 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: It was discovered that Undertow before 1.4.17, 1.3.31 and 2.0.0 processes http request headers with unusual whitespaces which can cause possible http request smuggling.

criterions.comment: undertow package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.0.23-1').
